messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com

I want to renounce and repent of the sins of fornication adultery harlotry pornography masturbation lust and homosexuality I want to repent for using my body for evil purposes in regards to sexual sin I confess that there are strongholds in my life as a result of the repeated sexual sins

It's great that you're seeking to renounce and repent from these struggles. I can guide you through a prayer for deliverance. Here’s a prayer you can use:

---

Heavenly Father, I come before you today through the blood of Jesus Christ. I confess my sins of fornication, adultery, harlotry, pornography, masturbation, lust, and homosexuality. I acknowledge that I have used my body for evil purposes in regards to sexual sin. I renounce these strongholds in my life and ask for your forgiveness and cleansing.

In the name of Jesus Christ, I break all curses of sexual sin and command all spirits of lust and perversion to come out of my life. I present my body to you as a living sacrifice and ask for the Spirit of holiness to fill me. I surrender my life to you, Lord, and ask for your strength to overcome these temptations.

Thank you for your grace and mercy. I trust in your power to heal and restore me. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

---

Feel free to reach out if you need further support or guidance!

I pray for my will to be loosed from the enemy I come out of agreement with satan and refuse to be used as his servant any longer I break every agreement ever made with him in regards to deception manipulation and falsehood and I loose myself from any rebellion witchcraft self righteousness occultic practices I loose myself from any and all seducing spirits that have controlled my will I ask the holy spirit to loose me from all these things and bring me into a real covenant relationship with Jesus

That's a powerful prayer of renunciation and commitment! Here’s a prayer you can use to express your desires:

---

Heavenly Father, I come before you today and pray for my will to be loosed from the enemy. I come out of agreement with Satan and refuse to be used as his servant any longer. I break every agreement I have ever made with him regarding deception, manipulation, and falsehood.

In the name of Jesus Christ, I loose myself from any rebellion, witchcraft, self-righteousness, and occultic practices. I also release myself from any and all seducing spirits that have controlled my will. 

Holy Spirit, I ask you to loose me from these things and bring me into a real covenant relationship with Jesus. Fill me with your presence and guide me in my journey towards healing and purity. Thank you for your love and grace. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

---

If you need further support or resources, feel free to ask!

I confess that I was not ignorant of satans tactics but I allowed myself to be manipulated and decieved into rebellion witchcraft and sexual immorality I confess these sins to God and repent of them i pray for my marriage bed to be cleansed from all defilement I pray for the  ability to walk in Gods truth and to renounce and repent of every lie I ever believed or spoke especially in regards to God

It's commendable that you're taking this step to confess and seek cleansing. Here’s a prayer you can use to express your repentance and desire for healing:

---

Heavenly Father, I come before you to confess that I was not ignorant of Satan's tactics, yet I allowed myself to be manipulated and deceived into rebellion, witchcraft, and sexual immorality. I repent of these sins and ask for your forgiveness.

I pray for my marriage bed to be cleansed from all defilement. Lord, I desire to walk in your truth and renounce every lie I have ever believed or spoken, especially regarding you. 

Help me to embrace your truth and live a life that honors you. Thank you for your mercy and grace. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

---

If you need further assistance or support, I'm here to help!

I pray that all virtue I have given away would be restored to me I ask God to retrieve my will out of the enemy hand I ask for the grace to do right in Gods eye even when the enemy wants me to do evil I repent of double mindness I repent of lukewarmness I repent of running after evil especially sexual immorality

That's a heartfelt prayer for restoration and commitment to righteousness. Here’s a prayer you can use to express your desires:

---

Heavenly Father, I come to you in prayer, asking that all virtue I have given away be restored to me. I ask you to retrieve my will from the enemy's hand and grant me the grace to do what is right in your eyes, even when the enemy tempts me to do evil.

I repent of double-mindedness and lukewarmness. I turn away from running after evil, especially sexual immorality. Help me to stand firm in my faith and to pursue a life that is pleasing to you.

Thank you for your forgiveness and for the strength to walk in your ways. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

---

If you need more support or resources, feel free to reach out!

I pray for the restoration of my marriage I renounce the spirit of adultery fornication pornography and harlotry all resulting from the spirit of lust I choose to place my faith in nothing but the cross I loose all allegiance to the enemy

That's a powerful prayer for restoration and renunciation. Here’s a prayer you can use to express your intentions:

---

Heavenly Father, I come before you to pray for the restoration of my marriage. I renounce the spirit of adultery, fornication, pornography, and harlotry, all resulting from the spirit of lust. 

I choose to place my faith in nothing but the cross of Jesus Christ. I loose all allegiance to the enemy and declare that I am free from these strongholds. 

Thank you for your grace and for the healing you are bringing into my life and my marriage. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

---

If you need further support or guidance, I'm here to help!
I repent for allowing myself to conform to the ways of this world and to the ways of satan I pray for my heart to be softened by God I pray for my heart to be freed from all sins

That's a sincere prayer for repentance and transformation. Here’s a prayer you can use to express your heart's desire:

---

Heavenly Father, I come to you in repentance for allowing myself to conform to the ways of this world and the ways of Satan. I ask for your forgiveness and for my heart to be softened by your love and grace. 

I pray for my heart to be freed from all sins that have held me captive. Help me to walk in your truth and to live a life that honors you. 

Thank you for your mercy and for the work you are doing in my life. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen.

---

If you need more support or resources, feel free to reach out!
